scripts.build: node scripts/compile.js && node scripts/build.js && cp -r views/static build
scripts.dev: npm run build && (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; onchange 'content/**/*.txt' -- node scripts/compile.js & onchange 'content/**/*.html' -- node scripts/build.js & onchange 'views/static/*' -- cp -r views/static build & python3 -m http.server --directory build)
